title: Retirement Advisor: Famous Last Words
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The story of America’s first celebrity economist, Irving Fisher, should cure anybody still milling about for expert predictions. This podcast (7:06) argues that investors, instead of spinning their heads listening to other people’s predictions, would do well to secure for themselves predictable income. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
